title: FS/FT: SGC and PSA Graded cards  ALL SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS/FT: SGC and PSA Graded cards  ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
***2/20 Some prices dropped, and new cards added. Need them out of my drawer!  haha.  If you don't like the price, make me an offer!

Continuing to upgrade the set and get rid of dupes.

Prices listed include shipping.  I'm always willing to listen to offers, but anyone saying "I'll take it" gets preference.  Payment via PP F&F is preferred.

My scanner doesn't do well with graded, especially SGC cards. I can take a picture and email it to you if you prefer.

Trade offers welcomed!  If you have something, it may be an upgrade for me, so I'm all ears.  If you have any EPDG's or oversized cards, those work for me too.





$SOLD Bill Graham PSA 1.5
$SOLD Bill Lattimore SGC 30
$SOLD Glenn Liebhardt SGC 30
$SOLD Fred Burchell SGC A but nice 
$SOLD Gabby Street Portrait PSA 2(MK)
